Test Set: 20668296
 Test: SD_GLB_90_OTCwithZVD3_plantflip
 Run: Run_11-3_6-26-16

 Test Parameters:

Step: Step 3

 Description:
 
DELIVERY IS CREATED WITH THE OTHER PLANT


Expected:
 
DELIVERY IS CREATED WITH THE OTHER PLANT


Actual:
 
While creating a sales order with 4 line items,
and 10 qty each.
 
When creating delivery deleted first line item and rest of the line items 2 partialy delivered 1 completely delivered.
 
For this scenario, Plant FLIP is not happening for partialy delivered line items.
 
Defect raised.

Change Summary:

Business wanted to change the plant for an item after a delivery is partially shipped/created for those order items. In short, Business partially delivers an order from one plant and then attempting balance order quantity to be delivered from a different location.

RT Defect:

Sales order created with 4 line items, and 10 qty each. And tried creating delivery deleted first line item and rest of the line items (2) partialy delivered (1) completely delivered.
In this scenario, Plant FLIP is not happening for partialy delivered line items(2).

Business Impact:

Due to this defect business would not be able to deliver order items from a different location, it leads to change in delivery priority.

requirement[489] : 20515960


Tax getting determined in templates when the condition validity is in future and pricing date is in the past.
Tax not getting determined in proposals when both pricing and condition validity dates are in future.
 
Owner confirmed it as A Test system issue

When executing ZV09 report for a particular document for UK(0800) region the output is not as expected. It has multiple billing documents and " multiple billing document" is appearing in corresponding field which should not happen.

Change Summary :                                  

ZV09 has the option to pick Multiple Invoice pertaining to the Delivery Document and display in multiple lines.Invoice Numbers need to replaced with text: MULTIPLE INVOICES.This is only for (0183 Company code/1830 Sales Org) and (0151 Company code/1510 Sales Org)

RT Defect :

While executing the report ZV09 for UK(0800) Sales org, found that “Multiple Invoice” message appears in the output report which actually should not appear.

There is a particular scenario where first a billing document is getting created, cancellation document type(S1) is created after which another invoice(F2) is created (correction).

Business Impact:

"Multiple Invoice” text in ZV09 is only for China FaPiao invoices.If the report include cancelled invoice also then duplicate entries will be created in the report.

Defect: RT - SAP - Double Credit Card Auth Attempts on CTO Orphan Matched Orders
 
Test Set: 21451445
 Test: SD_EMEA_042_INTRASAT_Divison71Movements_Process_001
 Run: Run_1-8_21-48-5
 

 
 
 

Test Parameters:
 
We have tested couple scenarios for AOU orders, This order is not relevant for Credit card authorisation but while doing orphan matching it went for authorisation and got failed. Due to the authorisation failed Delivery is not created.clarify.
data:order: 7286212672order: 7286142474

Change Summary:

In order to add CC authorization before creating delivery in ZRUMSPNA we need to add below steps.

1. Call FM SD_ORDER_CREDIT_RELEASE to update credit status from "A" to "D" . This is a pre-requisite for step 2 as in step 2 only orders with status "D" are identified.
2. Call  FM SD_ORDER_PAYMENTCARD_AUTHORISA in order to perform credit card authorization.

RT Defect:

Double credit card auth attempts on orphan matched orders

Business Impact:

while doing orphan matching the orders which are not relevant for Credit card authorisation will go for Credit card authorisation and will get failed as a result The AMR Payment team will see double auth attempts (and requirements) for CTO orders that have been orphan matched.Since the Credit Card authorisation is failed subsequent delivery  for the orders will not get created and the orders will go for subaequent screening which delays the ciustomer delivery time and causes customer dissatifaction and increase the revenue since different teams need to work on this issue to get it resolved.

Test Set: 21451445
 Test: SD_EMEA_042_INTRASAT_Divison71Movements_Process_001

 Test Parameters:

Step: Step 3

 Description:

Create Delivery matching with cancelled order using orphanmatching program ZM41S


Expected:

DN created Successfully with all the 3 line items.


Actual:
 
Change Summary:

In order to add CC authorization before creating delivery in ZRUMSPNA we need to add below steps.

1. Call FM SD_ORDER_CREDIT_RELEASE to update credit status from "A" to "D" . This is a pre-requisite for step 2 as in step 2 only orders with status "D" are identified.
2. Call  FM SD_ORDER_PAYMENTCARD_AUTHORISA in order to perform credit card authorization.

RT Defect:

Same as above in defect 35

Business Impact:

Same as defect 35 but impact to EMEA region.

Test Set[968] : 2106040
Hi Kiran,
 
This is w.r. to the FM Z_IDOC_INPUT_ZL12MT
 
While the testing for the few negative cases,wrong quantity is given in the LFIMG feild in E1EDP09 segment,eg ,DN quantity is 2 and idoc quantity is 5 ,still the idoc gets processed successfully and the delivery item is getting overwrited with the idoc quantity.
 
I feel though the idoc getting passed with 53 status ,the FM should not update the DN quantity and picking quantity in the DN,which gives the wrong information and the hence the scenario looks like PO quantity is lesser than the STO DN quantity which is wring
 
PO : 4300475803
DN : 8502214160
EDI 856 SC : 3844592015
 
Could you please advise on this,whether this is a historical issue in PD2
 
Also I checked the similar way for Z_IDOC_INPUT_Z17EMTE,in which whenever the wrong quantity is updated in idoc,it throws the error and goes to 51 status.Idoc no: 03844592016
 
Please find the screen shots in which the DN quantity is getting overwrited with the idoc quantity when executed in foreground
 
 
 
2. In a similar way,for the FM Z_IDOC_INPUT_Z17EMTE,when the serial segments are given higher that of the DN quantity,the idoc gets passed and the ZT391 table updates with the extra serial number ,however the DN quantity and PGI quantity remains the same.
 
Please find the document numbers and screen shots
 
EDI 856 SC: 3844343483
 
 
 
 
Please advise on this.
 
Thanks & Regards,
Sridhar Rajaram

Change Summary:

Changes to FM Z_IDOC_INPUT_ZL12MT, Z_IDOC_INPUT_Z17EMTE

RT Defect:

The idoc getting passed. It should not update the DN quantity and picking quantity in the delivery,which gives the wrong information and the hence the scenario looks like PO quantity is lesser than the STO DN quantity which is wrong.

OSS Note 548914 states the below

Stock transport orders with SD processing / delivery (for examplemovement type 641 for the goods issue, SD Transactions VL02, VL10):If these are stock transport orders with SD processing, the system neither checks during the goods receipt nor during the goods issueagainst the quantity ordered + overdelivery tolerance.

Business Impact:

Its a Known production issue and the OSS Note No is shown above also find the Espresso ticket No for the Known issue exp2://Ticket/13794484.
So the Business impact is very minimal

Change Summary:
           
Issue in  output program 'ZVADIN94_PDF_UG' for the  ticket<exp2://Ticket/21916447>.  The TVARVC ZCYP_DOC_CAT needs to be updated with a  additional value,  the Program was checking for the Document category in TVARVC ZCYP_DOC_CAT. As the Tvarvc was  setup to look only for Parameters option the program was changed  to lookup for Select-options. Corresponding code change was also required.

Business impact:

This could have been a potential P1 due to the payment authorization failure as a result  Delivery will not be created and  invoicing will be an issue due to in sufficient authorization. This saved manual effort required for delivery creation in Production and prevented customer dissatisfaction.

Postal Code check error in APAC.

Business impact :
StartFragment
This issue is a potential P1,Postal codes in an delivery is very important to speed up the delivery and to ensure correct shipping methods are chosen. If the postal code is missing this will lead to incorrect shipping and incurr loss to Apple.
We found a issue  while testing  <exp2://Ticket/21926112>, The mandatory postal code check for Hongkong is not behaving as expected.
        Postal code is not copied to ship to field in Sales quotation tab of IC webstore evenafter we launched a store with postal code 00000 without any error.
        Before Creating a quote ship to mandatory error message thrown in Partner tab but after creating the quote that error message was not displayed.
 We thought it is because of postal code 00000 and checked for EMEA country with same postal code but it is working fine.

B2B Filter Issues.


Business impact :
StartFragment
While filtering a product in B2B store with multiple attribute values , filter results are wrong. and also for product category APPLE TV filter results are wrong.These wrong filtering of products will lead to incorrect order placement & it will waste customers time to search the RiGHT product in a store.
While testing the warranty ticket <exp2://Ticket/22308575> we found some wrong filter results.

Test country:CA   Environment:IT6   User:ZY-PURCH-RSL01   Sold to: 2126

1. When we set filter to demo , filter results are displayed with both demo & normal products. Product:IPAD
2. When we set multiple filters with demo , filter results are wrong. Product:IPAD
3. when set filter for 16 GB capacity , products in all the filters are getting displayed. Product:IPAD
4. APPLE TV have only two products but having multiple filter options , whatever the filter criteria we apply the result is same two product.

EMEIA-Cork-PD3 Report ZRFV01 - Report Selection 'VAT Invoice Sales'  <exp2://Ticket/23335371>:  
 
Request:
 
Business requested add 2 column 'Fiscal Code' and 'City' in the output screen of Report ZRFV01, when selecting 'VAT Invoice Sales' in the selection screen in PD3 system.
 
As per the request, we have got the change done in the report with the help of our ABAP team and the changes are in test systems.
 
Issue:
 
With reference to the changes mentioned to Report ZRFV01 for Report Selection criteria validated the other report selection criteria such as
VAT Detailed POS Transaction, Daily Consumer Sales, Business Tax Report...
 
When executing the program is giving run time error.
 
Issue Fix:
 
Program was dumping with error "READ_REPORT_LINE_TOO_LONG”. This was because of the code was written in one line with more than 72 characters. Made the changes to the program by restricting the length to 72 and dividing the statement into two rows. TR DV3K959179

DSO Structure and Transformation are in sync with Production.Upper level targets of ZBPC_O09 were untouched and no impacts seen.On execution via Process chain, Delta DTP worked fine based on the ABAP logic in DTP. Delete the wrong data in target manually we can execute the DTP with required filter selection 3. It will impact all the dependency data load and increase the manual effort.

This is related to Pcard security. There is always a chance that cards can be decrypted from the encrypted value. And user experience also will get affected.

VAT ID is not getting picked in Engage for Known SAP Sold-to
 
Espresso ID: 24069324 - VAT ID is not getting picked in Engage for Known SAP Sold-to

Business impact :
StartFragment
When we print a invoice if VAT ID is not picked the end customer might to face the legal issues and it could impact the tax computations when converted to order.

Issue:
Automation Reource Teja Krishna not reachable for part 1 week.

Impact:
Existing Automation Script development plan need to be revisited.
Find Replacement resource and train.

HP ALM down time:  08/31/15 to 09/01/15

Origin of Issue:  Due to less memory space in C Drive, we are not able to login to Twine server.

Root cause:   Connecting ALM first time in Citrix, support objects and data files are automatically downloaded to the each user account(File size would be minimum 289 MB and it will be increased based on the usage ). Some user occupied more than 1.5 GB with old set of data.

Temp work around: Deleted all the temp and unnecessary files from the user profile and given some memory space to C drive as a temporary solution.

Resolution:  To extend the memory space from 100 GB to 200 GB at lest even if repository path changed to  D Drive.

Impact:
HP ALM usage by entire SAP RT team for 2 days
Planned automation execution on SD Production support ticket.

defectName: Purchase order search criteria is not working in PO Process  due confirmation work list
description:
Purchase order search criteria is not working in PO Process  due confirmation work list

Business impact:

"Suppliers use Purchase order work list to confirm the Pos on day to day business. Suppliers use ""PO search"" to pull out the specific PO to proceede with their confirmation activities.

The issue identified here is Serach criteria is not working. When we search the PO with PO number the results showes no PO exists though the po is very much available. It impacts many suppliers and may give an assumption that the PO really doesn't exist and PO confirmation process is heavily impacted"

defectName: PO not desappearing from process due confirmation and Change confirmation  work lists after sucessfully confirmation
description:
PO not desappearing from process due confirmation and Change confirmation  work lists after sucessfull confirmation

Business Impact:

Incorrect reporting on PO confirmation
The existing functionality is that, once supplier confirms the PO that should go off from his PO worklist. This was impacted due to the change.
Similarly, if the suppliers makes any changes to the PO using Process due confirmation worklist taht should go off and appear in change confirmation PO worklist. This too not happening due to the change.

defectName: Search fileds are missing in Process due confirmations and Change confirmation work lists
description:
Search fileds are missing in Process due confirmations and Change confirmation work lists when compared to IT9 system

Business Impact:


The below existing fields are missing in both Process due confirmation and Change confirmation work lists. These filed are commonly used filed in the PO worklists.
Purchasing group
Order type code

description:

description: Due to EHP upgarde, the database server was refreshed for moving project and support changes. As HP ALM database was also residing in the same DE3 server, the HP ALM database was migrated to DM4 server resulting in DE3 server downtime.

defectName: 26121199_Defect: 26 WEEK MOV AVRG-ALLOC(MIS) job is failing
description:
Potential P1 Issue
 
Issue:
Regression Testing ticket reference (25662795) raised for Forecast generated in 5651 and 5659 - 875-7699 - DP Ticket. the change made here is introduced two new jobs.
26 WEEK MOV AVRG-ALLOC(MIS)  job which is calculating system allocation factors key figure values.
 
RE-DISAGGREGATE MANUAL NUMBERS which will refresh dependent key figure values of disaggregation key figure and dis-aggregate the same
 
Technical Description:
 
the new job 26 WEEK MOV AVRG-ALLOC(MIS) j is failing in process chain (Compute History KFs & Disagg for ME-1 SUN).
 
Technical Impact Due to this failure:
 
Due to this job failure system allocation factors key figure values are not getting calculating and remaining jobs in process chain won't trigger successfully.
 
If 26 WEEK MOV AVRG-ALLOC(MIS) job itself failed then the sequence of jobs in the process chain won't trigger. jobs are below
APPLY OVERRIDE ALLOC FACTOR(for NG and G)
Apply Allocation Factor Override macro which will calculate Disaggregation Keyfigure value based on System allocation factors value will not be executed successfully
 
PROPAGATE FNL ALLOC FACTOR(for NG and G)
Propagate Disagg Allocation Factor macro which will propagete calculated dis aggregation key figure value from current week bucket to entire horizon. So this will not happened
 
RE-DISAGGREGATE MANUAL NUMBERS(for NG and G)
this job is used to refresh dependent key figures of Dis aggregation Key figure
 
COPY CORRHIST TO LIKEMODEL (for NONGR and GRWTH)
which will copy corrected history to like model process(history for the new products)
COMPUTE LIKEMODEL HIST( for NONGR and GRWTH)
 
which will caluculate history for the new products
 
COMPUTE NAIVE FCST(for NONGROWTH and GROWTH)
this will calculate naive forecast
 
Business Impact:
 
The newly introduced job “26 WEEK MOV AVRG-ALLOC (MIS) J” is failing in process chain. Due to this system allocation factors key figure values are not getting calculating and remaining jobs in process chain won't trigger successfully. Forecast for new products (both growth parts and non growth parts) will not be generated. this might have high impact in the business.
